org.apache.solr.common.params

Interface SimpleParams


  • public interface SimpleParams
    Parameters used by the SimpleQParser.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String AND_OPERATOR
      Enables AND operator (+)
      static String ESCAPE_OPERATOR
      Enables ESCAPE operator (\)
      static String FUZZY_OPERATOR
      Enables FUZZY operator (~)
      static String NEAR_OPERATOR
      Enables NEAR operator (~)
      static String NOT_OPERATOR
      Enables NOT operator (-)
      static String OR_OPERATOR
      Enables OR operator (|)
      static String PHRASE_OPERATOR
      Enables PHRASE operator (")
      static String PRECEDENCE_OPERATORS
      Enables PRECEDENCE operators: ( and )
      static String PREFIX_OPERATOR
      Enables PREFIX operator (*)
      static String QF
      Query fields and boosts.
      static String QO
      Override the currently enabled/disabled query operators.
      static String WHITESPACE_OPERATOR
      Enables WHITESPACE operators: ' ' '\n' '\r' '\t'
